paymentmode: How would you like to pay for the PBP Querent programme?
note: Note: The account will be used to transfer funds in case of treatment failure
inValidMobile: Please Enter Vaild 10 Digit Mobile Number
name: Name
terms: I have reviewed the PBP Querent schedule and I confirm that I have sufficient funds to adhere to it.
addApplicantNote: Note: The loan against caregiver's FD only allows you to add one applicant on your behalf.
addApplicantNoteFor5Members: Note: The loan against financial assistance allows you to add upto 5 applicant on your behalf.
addApplicantNoteFor1And5Members: Note: The loan against caregiver's FD and financial assistance allows you to add upto 1 and 5 applicant/s respectively on your behalf.
whichBankCurrentlyHoldFd: In which bank do you currently hold FDs ?
bankYouLiketoAvailLoan: From which of the following banks would you like to avail of a loan?
currentBankFd: The bank do you currently hold FDs ?
fromWhichBankLoan: From which of the following banks would you like to avail of a loan?
totalMedicationCost: Total Medication Cost for the program
TermsAndConditions: I would like to enroll for the PBP Querent programme. I have read and understood the terms of use for the programme.
programNotStarted: The PBP application has not been started yet. Please complete that first to view/add applicant.
confirmDelete: Please confirm to delete the selected applicant.
cancelApplication: Are you sure you want to cancel the application
selfPayFootNote: *Total medication cost of the program is calculated for PBP duration and maximum retail price in India.
loanFootNote: *This amount refers to the total loan amount calculated to cover the cost of therapy for the PBP program duration - this may differ based on the loan product offered by our lending partners.
uploadNote: Note: Supported document format is pdf and image(png, jpg, jpeg), the maximum size to upload a document is 15MB
uploadChequeError: Please upload a cancelled cheque to proceed
